info.name: Dummy API
info.description: This page will contains all rest service .Thease are Fake Online REST API for Testing and Prototyping of sample application which are using rest call to display listing and crud features. You can use this rest api tutorials, faking a server, sharing code examples.

exec: tests["Name should match given nomeGerado"] = jsonData.data.name === postman.getEnvironmentVariable("nomeGerado");
tests["Salary should match given salarioGerado"] = jsonData.data.salary === postman.getEnvironmentVariable("salarioGerado");
tests["Age should match given salarioGerado"] = jsonData.data.age === postman.getEnvironmentVariable("idadeGerada");
